message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40% of the money. You can either accept or make a counteroffer.
You're starting too high, I'll give you a chance to lower your end.
That's still a bit too skewed towards you. I'm looking for a more balanced split.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a larger share. Let's split it 45-55.
You're getting desperate, I'm willing to give you a small amount, but you're still getting the short end of the stick.
That's still a very uneven split. I'm hoping for something better in the next round.
I'm trying to be realistic now. Let's split it 30-70. I'll take a smaller share to give you more.
You're getting close to the end, I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly larger share, for now.
That's still way too skewed towards you. I need a better deal to survive.
I'm running out of options. Let's split it 20-80, I'll take the smaller share.
You're really running out of time, and I'm still not impressed with your offers. This is my last chance to get a good deal.
That's an insult. I'll try to make one last offer, but I'm not optimistic.
I'm really running out of options. Let's split it 10-90, I'll take whatever I can get.
You're really desperate now, and I'm not going to let you get away with such a bad deal. This is my final offer.
I have no choice. I'll accept your offer, but I'm not happy about it.
